/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun that filters through the trees lining the street. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the cityscape.
